llm_res.rule: The function `name()` should return the name of the token. This is an optional method but if implemented, it should return the actual token name.

The function `allowance(address owner, address spender)` should return the amount which `spender` is still allowed to withdraw from `owner`. The implementation should not modify this value unless through `approve` or `transferFrom`.

llm_res: NO. The interface provided in the code does not contain the function `transfer(address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success)`.
